title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Resentment; Brady's Bucs Masterpiece; The Mahomes Machine; Stafford Sweepstakes; Darnold's Destination
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Resentment; Brady's Bucs Masterpiece; The Mahomes Machine; Stafford Sweepstakes; Darnold's Destination
description:
In this episode, John discusses Aaron Rodgers raising eyebrows with his post NFC Championship comments referencing an 'uncertain' future in Green Bay, why Brady taking the Bucs back to the Super Bowl shows he's the best teammate ever, why the gap between Mahomes and the rest of the NFL is bigger than any recent NFL era, which teams Matt Stafford can have the biggest impact with, and why signs point to the Jets already having made their decision on Sam Darnold. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
